snippet.textDisplay: @AkumaUchitoru School project where i was trying to show how far technology had come along. Originally wanted to show the intro to FF VII but i brought in the wrong game.

snippet.textDisplay: @Arc13 They didnt laugh, but it was very awkward afterward. Very quiet and very awkward.

snippet.textDisplay: This intro brings some great memories. The first game's intro is my favorite of all time and is on another level personally, but I've always liked this one as well. The japanese version has vocals in it, but I prefer this version since it's the one I've always known and it has a more western feel to it.
snippet.textOriginal: This intro brings some great memories. The first game's intro is my favorite of all time and is on another level personally, but I've always liked this one as well. The japanese version has vocals in it, but I prefer this version since it's the one I've always known and it has a more western feel to it.
